bill.title: State Department of Education; require certain actions to improve program of internal auditing.
bill.description: An Act To Require Certain Specific Actions To Be Taken Relating To The Internal Audit Organization Of The State Department Of Education To Improve The Agency's Program Of Internal Auditing; To Bring Forward Section 25-65-9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Requires State Agencies To Employ An Agency Internal Audit Director And Staff, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 25-65-11, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Establishes The Qualifications For Internal Audit Directors, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 25-65-13, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Prescribes The Duties Of Internal Audit Directors, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
